name: SpiX
description:
SpiX is a challenging trap adventure like game where players must escape the depth and reach the surface .. but are you strong and confident enough to face the trails ahead ? 

Controls: 

Move  = Arrows

Jump = Space

Reload current level  = R

Menu  = Back Space

Close application = Esc

Toggle fullscreen = Alt+Enter  

Importante Note : players can replay the current level as much as they want but quitting to the main menu will restart from level 1 .
